name: 999.dev - AI Teammate
description: An AI teammate that integrates with Slack, Linear, and GitHub to turn team conversations into development work. Handles feature requests, bug discussions, cross-team coordination, and code review workflows.
creator: malpacas
useCases: Team conversation to development task conversion

name: Inventory Query Agent
description: This simple project uses VoltAgent and TypeScript to create an agent connected to a custom tool that queries a database (SQL, NoSQL, or any other system). The agent receives an input parameter such as a product name or code, queries the database, filters the results, and returns useful information like stock quantity, product name, description, and the specific store or location where it's available.
creator: Carranza12
useCases: Employees in physical stores or warehouses can quickly check product availability and location
eCommerce platforms can track product inventory before launching promotions or managing stock
Integration with customer service chatbots to automatically answer product availability questions
Generate inventory reports without manual intervention
Internal dashboards for logistics, purchasing, or sales teams
